text: this coconut cherry smoothie is one of
my favorites to make any time of the
year you just need frozen cherries
coconut water some lime juice couldn't
be simpler and it's so refreshing so
start with 2 cups of frozen cherries now
if you're in cherry season you can
certainly use the fresh ones just add
about half a cup of ice cubes for a nice
crunch slushie texture then 1 cup of
coconut water I'm using my favorite
product here which is a raw coconut
water and sometimes if you're really
lucky you get the bright pink one so it
just means there's a lot of antioxidant
activity happening in this little
coconut the clear ones are fine as well
and then we're gonna do about a
tablespoon of squeezed fresh lime juice
this is such a great pick-me-up in the
afternoon when you're sort of feeling a
little sluggish this is just bright and
hydrating super rich in vitamin C -
that's our cherry contribution and if
you grew up loving cherry lime aids like
I did this is a nod to a childhood
favorite
okay ooh so pretty and frothy cannot
wait to dive in Cheers mmm
so delicious super hydrating gotta love
that it's just three ingredients
